summary: Completed testing of SellerCloudX Seller Landing Page updates and Admin Leads Management. All 6 requested features tested and working correctly.
critical_code_review_comments: SellerLandingPage.tsx - Well-structured premium landing page with FOMO elements (countdown timer, spots counter)
AdminLeadsManagement.tsx - Clean implementation with stats cards, search/filter, and lead details modal
Backend leads API properly handles PostgreSQL with fallback to MongoDB
seed_data_creation: Created test leads via API: TEST_Pytest Lead, TEST_Minimal Lead
context_for_next_testing_agent: Seller landing page and Admin Leads tab fully functional. All lead capture and management features working.

details.hook_text: ✅ 'Marketplace'larda savdo qilasiz, lekin natija yo'qmi?' - Found
details.kurslar_text: ✅ 'Qimmat kurslar va hodimlar kerak emas!' - Found
details.sub_hook: ✅ 'Yoki qimmat kurslarga oylab vaqt sarflab o'rganmoqchimisiz?' - Found

details.text_found: ✅ '1 ta AI Manager = 3-4 ta professional hodim ishi' - Correctly shows 3-4 (not 34)

details.form_fields: ✅ All fields present: Ism Familiya, Telefon, Hudud, Savdo hajmi, Biznes turi, Qo'shimcha xabar

details.stats_cards: ✅ 8 stats cards: Jami, Yangi, Bog'lanildi, Kvalifikatsiya, Hamkor, Yo'qotildi, Bugun, Hafta
details.search_filter: ✅ Search input and status filter dropdown present

details.leads_list: ✅ Shows all leads with name, phone, region, sales volume, business type, date, source
details.lead_details_modal: ✅ Opens on click with full lead information
details.status_update: ✅ Status dropdown with options: Yangi, Bog'lanildi, Kvalifikatsiya, Hamkor bo'ldi, Yo'qotildi

screenshots_taken: .screenshots/seller_hero_mobile.jpg - Seller page hero section with hook questions
.screenshots/admin_leadlar_section.jpg - Admin Leads tab with stats and list
.screenshots/admin_lead_details_modal.jpg - Lead details modal with status update

mocked_apis.note: All features tested against real backend with PostgreSQL database
